examples:
Input:arr = [1,1,2,2,2,2], target = 5Output:12Explanation:arr[i] = 1, arr[j] = arr[k] = 2 occurs 12 times:
We choose one 1 from [1,1] in 2 ways,
and two 2s from [2,2,2,2] in 6 ways.
Input:arr = [2,1,3], target = 6Output:1Explanation:(1, 2, 3) occured one time in the array so we return 1.
data.problem_statement:
Given an integer arrayarr, and an integertarget, return the number of tuplesi, j, ksuch thati < j < kandarr[i] + arr[j] + arr[k] == target.

As the answer can be very large, return itmodulo109+ 7.
data.title: 3Sum With Multiplicity
